summary: WHEN IT RAINS THE DOORS OR WINDOWS LEAKS AND THE INSIDE GETS MOLD ALL OVER.  I HAD THE DOOR LATCHES FIXED BECAUSE WHEN I TRIED TO SHUT THE REAR PASSENGER WOULD NOT SHUT, OPENED UP WHEN I WAS ABOUT THREE BLOCKS FROM MY HOUSE ALREADY AND I HAVE TAKEP IT IN FOR THE TRANSMISSION TWICE. THE CLUTCH DOESN'T SHIFT WHEN IT SUPPOSED TO, WHEN AT LIGHTS AND STOP SIGNS.
